text.section: A majority of the authorized membership of the Board is a quorum.
The Board shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

section.section:
Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection and to the State budget, each member of the Board is entitled to:
compensation of $500 per year, to be paid out of money that the Board collects; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations.
The Secretary or designee of the Secretary is not entitled to compensation under this subsection.

text.section: The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
